verses.verse: "Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> [me] to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you, that you might <S%H6213>do<s%> [them] in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H5674>going<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it,

<S%H4616>so<s%> that you and your <S%H1121>son<s%> and your <S%H1121>grandson<s%> might <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and His <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H9132>life,<s%> and that your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged.<s%>

"O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you should <S%H8085>listen<s%> and be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> [it], that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you and that you may <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, has <S%H1>promised<s%> you, [in] a <S%H1696>land<s%> <S%H776>flowing<s%> with <S%H2100>milk<s%> and <S%H2461>honey.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is our <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H259>one!<s%>

"And you shall <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3966>might.<s%>
"And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> shall be on your <S%H3824>heart;<s%>

and you shall <S%H8150>teach<s%> them <S%H8150>diligently<s%> to your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and shall <S%H1696>talk<s%> of them when you <S%H3427>sit<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> and when you <S%H1980>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> and when you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> and when you <S%H6965>rise<s%> up.
"And you shall <S%H7194>bind<s%> them as a <S%H226>sign<s%> on your <S%H3027>hand<s%> and they shall be as <S%H2903>frontals<s%> on your <S%H996>forehead.<s%> <S%H5869><s%>
"And you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> them on the <S%H4201>doorposts<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%> and on your <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

"Then it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brings<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers, <S%H1>Abraham,<s%> <S%H85>Isaac<s%> and <S%H3327>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H3290>give<s%> you, <S%H5414>great<s%> and <S%H1419>splendid<s%> <S%H2896>cities<s%> <S%H5892>which<s%> you did not <S%H834>build,<s%>

and <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H2898>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you did not <S%H4390>fill,<s%> and <S%H2672>hewn<s%> <S%H953>cisterns<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you did not <S%H2672>dig,<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>trees<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you did not <S%H5193>plant,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%>

then <S%H8104>watch<s%> yourself, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery.<s%>
"You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> [only] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and you shall <S%H5647>worship<s%> Him, and <S%H7650>swear<s%> by His <S%H8034>name.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H312>any<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> you,

for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> <S%H6435>otherwise<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and He will <S%H8045>wipe<s%> you <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H5254>put<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> to the <S%H5254>test,<s%> as you <S%H5254>tested<s%> [Him] at <S%H4532>Massah.<s%>

"You should <S%H8104>diligently<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and His <S%H9381>testimonies<s%> and His <S%H2706>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

"And you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> what is <S%H3477>right<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you and that you may <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to [give] your fathers,
by <S%H1920>driving<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> you in <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> [do] the <S%H9381>testimonies<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> [mean] <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you?'

then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to your <S%H1121>son,<s%> 'We were <S%H5650>slaves<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> us from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

'Moreover, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>showed<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7451>distressing<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> before our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> against <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>household;<s%>

and He <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out from <S%H8033>there<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> us in, to <S%H5414>give<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to our fathers.'

"So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for our <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H3117><s%> and for our <S%H2421>survival,<s%> as [it is] <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"And it will be <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> for us <S%H3588>if<s%> we are <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us.
